column1: #####  LOCALISATION for the Dark World Content Pack   #####

column2: [redhand_hero.GetFirstName] has distinguished herself in battle. She was a whirlwind of beauty, death and destruction.  This siege victory has brought out the best in many of your troops, but many in the battle today were impressed by [redhand_hero.GetFirstName]. \n \n The very fact that you are her liege adds prestige to your name as well...
